faqs.question: What is Bonfire?
faqs.answer: Bonfire enables companies to build enterprise-grade chatbot GPT, which are trained specifically on their unique datasets. It's designed to streamline and enhance customer interactions by integrating seamlessly with the company's existing apps and platforms.

faqs.question: Where is my data stored?
faqs.answer: At Bonfire, we take data security seriously. All your data is securely stored in our advanced cloud-based storage system which complies with international security standards such as SOC2.

faqs.question: What kind of data can I integrate into Bonfire?
faqs.answer: With Bonfire, virtually any type of structured and unstructured dataset can be integrated into our platform. This includes PDF, CSV, and TXT. You can also integrate data from your CRM, ERP, and other business systems.

faqs.question: Can I give specific instructions to my chatbot?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! You have complete control over how your bot responds to different prompts based on your business needs. You can train the bot according to specific use case by defining a bot prompt in the platformâ€™s settings.

faqs.question: How can I add Bonfire to my website?
faqs.answer: Adding Bonfire to your website is very simple process where you just copy-paste a few lines of code provided by us after you create the chatbot. It can be integrated into any React, Wix, Squarespace, Webflow, Wordpress, HTML, or Shopify website.

faqs.question: Does Bonfire support other languages?
faqs.answer: Yes! One of the best features about using Bonfire is its multi-lingual support, empowering you engage with customers across languages.
